title: “Biotechnology Unit” means and includes Biotechnology units which are certified by the Development Commissioner (Industries) or any other officer authorized by him on his behalf
clause_text: “Biotechnology Unit” means and includes Biotechnology units which are certified by the Development Commissioner (Industries) or any other officer authorized by him on his behalf.
